mapper.select: -- rlabTeamGateDtl TEAM GATE 상세리스트 SELECT MST.TEAM_GATE_ID AS teamGateId ,MST.TITL AS titl ,MST.SBC AS sbc ,MST.ATTC_FIL_ID AS attcFilId ,MST.FRST_RGST_DT AS frstRgstDt ,MST.FRST_RGST_ID AS frstRgstId ,dbo.fn_getUserName(MST.FRST_RGST_ID) AS frstRgstNm ,DTL.TEAM_GATE_DTL_ID AS teamGateDtlId ,DTL.EV1 AS ev1 ,DTL.EV2 AS ev2 ,DTL.EV3 AS ev3 ,DTL.EV4 AS ev4 ,DTL.EV5 AS ev5 ,DTL.EV6 AS ev6 ,DTL.EV7 AS ev7 ,DTL.EV8 AS ev8 ,DTL.EV9 AS ev9 ,DTL.EV10 AS ev10 ,DTL.EV_CMPL_YN AS evCmplYn ,(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM IRIS_TEAM_GATE_DTL SUB WHERE SUB.TEAM_GATE_ID=MST.TEAM_GATE_ID) AS evCnt FROM IRIS_TEAM_GATE_MST MST LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_TEAM_GATE_DTL DTL ON MST.TEAM_GATE_ID=DTL.TEAM_GATE_ID AND DTL.FRST_RGST_ID=#{_userId} WHERE 1=1 AND MST.TEAM_GATE_ID=#{teamGateId}

-- rlabTeamGateCmplDtl TEAM GATE 결과상세 SELECT MST.TEAM_GATE_ID AS teamGateId ,MST.TITL AS titl ,MST.SBC AS sbc ,MST.ATTC_FIL_ID AS attcFilId ,MST.FRST_RGST_DT AS frstRgstDt ,MST.FRST_RGST_ID AS frstRgstId ,dbo.fn_getUserName(MST.FRST_RGST_ID) AS frstRgstNm ,SUM(DTL.EV1)/CONVERT(FLOAT,COUNT(1)) AS ev1 ,SUM(DTL.EV2)/CONVERT(FLOAT,COUNT(1)) AS ev2 ,SUM(DTL.EV3)/CONVERT(FLOAT,COUNT(1)) AS ev3 ,SUM(DTL.EV4)/CONVERT(FLOAT,COUNT(1)) AS ev4 ,SUM(DTL.EV5)/CONVERT(FLOAT,COUNT(1)) AS ev5 ,SUM(DTL.EV6)/CONVERT(FLOAT,COUNT(1)) AS ev6 ,SUM(DTL.EV7)/CONVERT(FLOAT,COUNT(1)) AS ev7 ,SUM(DTL.EV8)/CONVERT(FLOAT,COUNT(1)) AS ev8 ,SUM(DTL.EV9)/CONVERT(FLOAT,COUNT(1)) AS ev9 ,SUM(DTL.EV10)/CONVERT(FLOAT,COUNT(1)) AS ev10 ,(SUM(DTL.EV1) +SUM(DTL.EV2) +SUM(DTL.EV3) +SUM(DTL.EV4) +SUM(DTL.EV5) +SUM(DTL.EV6) +SUM(DTL.EV7) +SUM(DTL.EV8) +SUM(DTL.EV9) +SUM(DTL.EV10))/CONVERT(FLOAT,COUNT(1)) AS evSum ,COUNT(1) AS evCnt FROM IRIS_TEAM_GATE_MST MST inner JOIN IRIS_TEAM_GATE_DTL DTL ON MST.TEAM_GATE_ID=DTL.TEAM_GATE_ID WHERE 1=1 AND MST.TEAM_GATE_ID=#{teamGateId} GROUP BY MST.TEAM_GATE_ID ,MST.TITL ,MST.SBC ,MST.ATTC_FIL_ID ,MST.FRST_RGST_DT ,MST.FRST_RGST_ID ,dbo.fn_getUserName(MST.FRST_RGST_ID)
